news.description: A sense of change was palpable at the 90th Academy Awards as Hollywood sought to confront the post-Harvey Weinstein era and pivot to a vision of a more inclusive movie business. The ceremony Sunday at the Dolby Theatre in Los Angeles was punctuated by politic…
news.title: Peele, Del Toro, Oldman win at an Oscars full of change

news.description: Comedian Tiffany Haddish loves her white Alexander McQueen dress so much, she’s worn it several times — at a movie premiere, on “Saturday Night Live” and now on the 90th Academy Awards stage.
news.title: Tiffany Haddish wears same gown to Oscars that she wore to movie premiere, 'SNL'

news.description: Investors are scrutinizing their ownership of gun stocks following the mass shooting in Parkland, Florida. Passive index funds, which power many retirement plans, are the largest shareholders in America's three major gunmakers, according to Morningstar. About…
news.title: There's a straightforward way to find out if gun stocks are in your retirement fund (RGR, AOBC, VSTO)

news.description: Join film critics Kenneth Turan and Justin Chang for a live discussion of all the Oscars happenings during the show.
news.title: Watch with us: 90th Academy Awards

news.description: Election projections in Italy early Monday showed no single bloc or party with the support to win a majority in Parliament.
news.title: Election projections in Italy point to rise of populist and anti-EU forces, prospect of hung Parliament

news.description: “The Shape of Water” was the big winner at the 90th Annual Academy Awards on Sunday picking up a leading four Oscars. The off-beat fantasy about a mute cleaning woman who falls in love …
news.title: Oscars: ‘The Shape of Water’ Wins Big at Politically Charged Ceremony

news.description: Around one in four women move abroad for work-related reasons, according to InterNations, the world's largest network for expats. In its latest survey on expats' job satisfaction, the company interviewed around 7,000 working women living in 168 countries. Exp…
news.title: These 10 countries have the best career prospects for expat women
